`_erhc` erup %001 - si ti ereh. skcart no nwod dial eb ot gnol os detiaw taht saedi gnitaroprocni dna `eduks citsaihc' s`erhcetua yb deripsni ._ehr fo dlrow citsyc eth nioj ot uoy reffo i kcart raluger a gniod fo deatsni ?ssam yerg eht nioj ?noissergopr drohc dna sdeal htiw eceip raluger a kcart yhw

new objectives in sound exploration - source of unnatural sounds........ - - - - - [www.noisemusic.org]
----
Translation: why track a regular piece with leads and chord progression? join the grey mass? instead of doing a regular track i offer you to join the cystic world of rhe_. inspired by autechre's 'chiastic skude' and incorporating ideas that waited so long to be laid down on tracks. Here it is - 100% pure '_chre'.
